item.title: Checking it once, checking it twice
item.description:
Checking it once, checking it twice

Unlike Santa who seems to have all the time in the world, you've got a business to run. You can't just spare two hours to sift through the whole kit squinting to find each of those hidden expiry dates. Lukily you've found the easier way. Â The Medkit way.

item.title: Regulators
item.description:
Regulators

And I'm not talking about the one that keeps your work nice and cool. I'm talking about the one that keeps it safe. But if you are working in multiple states, are you checking that you are complying with all of them, not just where you are based?

item.title: Are you up to date?
item.description:
Are you up to date?

The Federal "FIRST AID IN THE WORKPLACE Code of Practice" was updated in 2015. Are you aware of the changes? Put someone in charge so you can get back to the important thing, running your business.
